description:
Rob contacted me last week. He said he was looking to make some money for an upcoming trip, and asked if I was interested in a solo with him.
You bet! Anyone who has been a fan of this site knows how hard it has been to keep the diversity goin, and Rob is a "sure thing" when it comes to hot guys. He was so much fun to work with when we just did photos.
Though, I was a little surprised to hear from him. He is very quiet, soft-spoken, so I guess I would call him shy. His reaction when he takes his pants off is priceless - he smiles and covers his eyes/face. Don't blink or you will miss it. It's very endearing.
But once he gets naked his confidence increases, and it's like dealing with a completely different Rob. By the end of the video he is completely in the zone.
He's nicely endowed and gifted with the proverbial bubble butt. If I can talk him in to it, I'd love to get him back for some guy-on-guy action. If that happens, I can't decide if I would like to see his front side, or his backside in action.
We'll see!
title: Rob - Solo
